_sText:
A shooting range map featuring several rooms:


- A pop up target room with varriable levels of difficulty
- A moving target room where the three targets strafe side to side
- A stand still target room where targets can be brought to the player to get a closer look at the bullet marks + all guns with extremely high amounts of ammo (spawn room)
- A grenade practice room with 3 distances
- A sniper practice room with various targets at different ranges


That's all there is to it.  Can be used to test out the accuracy of guns and their spreads or to practice aim and experiment with grenade throws.


- Starving Hobo
